doc: Allows given datasource to be renamed (for {@code javax.activation.DataHandler} perspective).

fields.name: dataSource
fields.doc: Original data source used for attachment.

fields.name: name
fields.doc: The new name (optional), which will be applied as email attachment.

methods.name: getName
methods.doc:
{@link #name} if provided, {@link DataSource#getName()} of the original datasource otherwise.

 @return name of data source

methods.name: getEncoding
